property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a cross gear from your mana zone or graveyard and put it into the battle zone. Cross that cross gear with this creature for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Neither player can untap spells in their mana zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If there are 2 or more Armored Dragons in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If there are 8 or more creatures in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each other creature in the battle zone. ■ This creature can't be blocked by creatures that have less power than it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you would discard a card during your opponent's turn, you may destroy this creature instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ When the crossed creature would be destroyed, add it to your shields face down instead. ■ While this card isn't crossed with a creature, creatures can only break 1 shield per attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your Splash Queen creatures. ■ When you put this creature, shieldify up to 3 cards from your hand. Then break the same number of your shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose a civilization. Draw a card for each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that have the chosen civilization.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature can't be attacked or blocked by creatures that have power 2000 or less. ■ While this card isn't crossed with a creature, creatures that have power 2000 or less can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Gargoyles. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each player chooses one of their shields and puts it into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy all creatures that are crossed with cross gear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Whenever the crossed creature attacks, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. ■ While this card isn't crossed with a creature, each creature in the battle zone gets "slayer".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 3 cards from your mana zone and put the rest into your graveyard. Then your opponent chooses 3 cards from their mana zone and puts the rest into their graveyard. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets "power attacker +4000". ■ While this card isn't crossed with a creature, each creature in the battle zone gets "speed attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ACCELERATOR} (While this creature is crossed with a cross gear, this creature gets the following Accelerator ability.) Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a creature or cross gear from your deck, show that card to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ The crossed creature gets +3000 power. ■ While this card isn't crossed with a creature, your creatures each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Instead of having the crossed creature attack, you may tap it to use this {TAP} ability: {TAP} Search your deck. You may take a non-evolution creature that has the same name as the crossed creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ While battling a Demon Command or Dragon creature, this creature gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have a crossed creature in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Each creature crossed with a cross gear gets +1000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed during your opponent's turn, untap all your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a cross gear in the battle zone and put it on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature blocks, you may draw a card. ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that have the same race as the crossed creature gets +1000 power. ■ Whenever creatures that have the same race as the crossed creature attack, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have 6 or more creatures in your graveyard, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ When you put this creature, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature is destroyed, your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ACCELERATOR} (While this creature is crossed with a cross gear, this creature gets the following Accelerator ability.) Whenever this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, search your opponent's deck. Choose a card from among it and put it into their graveyard. Then your opponent shuffles their deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If there is a 'Brother Lizard' in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Untap one of your other creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you cross this creature with a cross gear, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it and all cross gear crossed with that creature into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ {CROSS GEAR} (Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone.) ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that have the same race as the crossed creature gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's cross gear and put it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a cross gear in your graveyard and return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a spell, put it into your hand. If it's not, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {GRAVITY ZERO} If there is an Angel Command in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put another creature into the battle zone, return this creature to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If there is a Cyber Lord in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {METAMORPH} (If you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone, this creature gets the following Metamorph ability.) This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If there is a Demon Command in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ Darkness creatures are put into the battle zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, this creature gets +3000 power and "double breaker" until the end of the turn.

card.name: Fokker, Rider of the North Wind

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If there is an Armored Wyvern in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard. Then your opponent chooses a card in their mana zone and puts it into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever a cross gear is put into the battle zone, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put any number of cards from your hand into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you have an evolution creature in the battle zone, this creature gets +3000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If there is a Horned Beast in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have cards of all 5 civilizations in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Whenever one of your creatures would be destroyed, if you have cards of all 5 civilizations in the battle zone, return that creature to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If a player has 9 or more cards in their hand, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ At the start of your turn, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Armored Dragons. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution Dragon from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ Triple breaker
